SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card

Class Face

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.Card.Face
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackFace, FrontFace
public abstract class Face extends Object implements Serializable
The Face class represents a face of a card in the game (front or back) It implements the Serializable interface to allow for object serialization
See Also:

    • Face

      public Face(String imagePath, Kingdom colour, Corner cornerUR, Corner cornerUL, Corner cornerLR, Corner cornerLL)
      constructor for the face of the card with the given parameters
      Parameters:
      imagePath - the path of the image converted to string
      colour - the colour of the card
      cornerUR - corner upper right
      cornerUL - corner upper left
      cornerLR - corner lower right
      cornerLL - corner lower left

      public Corner getCorner(int i, int j)
      gets the needed corner it uses indexes as cartesian coordinates ==> (1, 1) for UR, (-1, 1) for UL, (-1, -1) for LL, (1, -1) for LR
      Parameters:
      i - index
      j - index
      Returns:
      the corner needed
